Class HibernatePersistenceProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.persistence.HibernatePersistenceProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler, PersistenceProvider

    @Singleton
public class HibernatePersistenceProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements PersistenceProvider
    A implementation of the persistence provider based on hibernate
